articles.title: For Asian Americans Wary of Attacks, Reopening Is Not an Option - The New York Times
articles.description: Facing a wave of animosity, many Asian Americans remain afraid of public places even as the coronavirus pandemic recedes.

articles.title: Support for same-sex marriage reaches record high in US, poll shows - CNN
articles.description: A record 70% of Americans support legal recognition of same-sex marriage, according to a new Gallup poll. That's the highest level of support seen since Gallup starting tracking the subject in 1996, when just 27% of Americans were in favor of legal recognitio…

articles.author: James Doubek
articles.title: As Long As A Basketball Court: Australia's Largest Dinosaur Confirmed - NPR
articles.description: "Cooper," a gargantuan dinosaur that roamed the Outback, is first of its kind found outside South America. The new species had long necks and tails, four legs and ate plants.
articles.content:
Australotitan cooperensis is the new species confirmed by paleontologists in Australia. It's the biggest dinosaur discovered in Australia.
